frontmatter.title: Konfigurasjonskontroll for økt sikkerhet i skyløsninger – del 2
frontmatter.description: Tidligere i sikkerhetsmåneden skrev jeg en sak som tok for seg utfordringer med konfigurasjonskontroll, sett i sammenheng med angrepet Uber ble utsatt for, med noen tips om hvordan man kan beskytte seg bedre mot denne type angrep.

frontmatter.title: Why you need a Managed Detection & Response service
frontmatter.description: Businesses today operate in a highly dynamic and fast-paced environment, where technology plays a vital role in driving growth and success. However, this also means that businesses are increasingly vulnerable to cyber attacks and data breaches, which can have serious consequences, including financial losses, damage to reputation, and loss of customer trust.

frontmatter.description: Guide on setting up Alienvault feed to Azure Sentinel

frontmatter.title: Monitoring to stay ahead of the threat landscape
frontmatter.description: It is often difficult to catch everything crawling around your network. Especially what is outside your network. That is also where new vulnerabilities get discovered every day and every hour.
